p: First, to test differences in the risks of infection for males and females, a two-sided test was carried out with respect to M/F ratio for pdmH1N1 and seasonal influenza. Bonferroni's method was employed for multiple statistical comparisons in each of the 19 age groups to adjust the significance level of each comparison to a more conservative level. Next, the M/F ratios for pdmH1N1 in each of the age groups were compared to those for seasonal influenza infections in 2005.
